statements: SELECT * FROM product_pricing ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM product_pricing;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, last_updated FROM product_pricing WHERE price <= 50 AND product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY price ASC, last_updated ASC
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE product_name NOT LIKE '%banana%' AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM product_pricing;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_name ILIKE '%analysis%' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, last_updated FROM product_pricing WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND price < 100;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT AVG(price), MIN(price), MAX(price) FROM product_pricing;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE market_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT products.product_name, pricing_history.price FROM products JOIN pricing_history ON products.product_id = pricing_history.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, ph.price, mt.trend_name FROM products p JOIN pricing_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id JOIN market_trends mt ON p.market_trend = mt.trend_name;

SELECT p.product_name, ph.price, mt.trend_name FROM products p LEFT JOIN pricing_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id LEFT JOIN market_trends mt ON p.market_trend = mt.trend_name WHERE ph.price < 50;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_history GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.name, pa.price AS adjusted_price, pa.reason FROM products p LEFT JOIN pricing_adjustments pa ON p.id = pa.product_id WHERE pa.adjustment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pa.adjustment_date DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.name, ph.price, ph.effective_date FROM products p INNER JOIN pricing_history ph ON p.id = ph.product_id WHERE ph.effective_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY ph.effective_date DESC;

SELECT pt.trend_name, COUNT(pa.id) AS total_adjustments FROM market_trends pt LEFT JOIN pricing_adjustments pa ON pt.id = pa.id GROUP BY pt.trend_name HAVING total_adjustments > 5 ORDER BY total_adjustments DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, inventory FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE inventory > 0 AND category LIKE '%food%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price, inventory FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01' AND change_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT users.username, users.email, products.product_name FROM users JOIN products ON users.user_id = products.product_id WHERE users.role='Admin';
SELECT products.product_name, price, description FROM products JOIN market_trends ON products.product_id = market_trends.trend_id;
